description: This script demonstrates how to use the NebiusTools for text-to-image generation with Nebius AI Studio, including creating agents with different models and saving generated images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of executing tools and generating responses.

classes.name: NebiusTools
classes.description: A class representing the Nebius text-to-image generation tool.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt to generate images.
